name: Public Survey DAG
description: Assign a public url for each DAG in a project

system-settings.name:
Enable API Urls
If you use shibboleth authentication, you may be forced to use API-based urls for your public survey url equivalents. Check this box to do so.

Enable Debug Logging
If you have the Stanford emLogger external module installed and configured, you can enable additional debug-level logging through this checkbox

project-settings.name:
Add Prefix to Record Ids
If checked, newly created records will be prefixed with the DAG name or the DAG id (e.g. Stanford-1, Stanford-2, ...). If unchecked, records will be auto-numbered using a pool shared across all dags (e.g. 1, 5, ...)

Prefix with ID instead of Name
This option only applies if the previous option is checked. It will prefix with dag ID instead of dag Name.

Delete Incomplete Records
When someone clicks on a DAG-PUBLIC link but does not complete the survey, an 'empty' record is left behind. To automatically delete these records enter a number of hours since creation that a record should remain. A reasonable value is 12 hours. If you leave this blank, no records will be auto-deleted

Enable Debug Logging
If you have the Stanford emLogger external module installed and configured, you can enable additional debug-level logging through this checkbox

crons.cron_description: Delete empty records created by public dag url after a specified amount of time
